Public Meeting In the Albert Hall, Manchester, Tuesday, October 3rd, AT EIGHT P.M., TO PROTEST AGAINST THE ABOLITION OF THE WORK OF WOMEN AT THE PITBROWS, And to Demand the Franchise. SPEAKERS THE MAYOR AND MAYORESS OF WIGAN. MRS. NANCY DISLEY (Pitbrow Worker) MRS. ELIZA NEAL (Pitbrow Worker) MISS KING MAY MISS REDDISH MISS GORE-BOOTH MRS. DICKENSON MISS ROPER.
Speakers: ['The Mayor and Mayoress of Wigan', 'Mrs. Nancy Disley', 'Mrs. Eliza Neal', 'Miss King-May', 'Miss Reddish', 'Miss Gore-Booth', 'Mrs. Dickenson', 'Miss Roper']
Description: To protest against the abolition of the work of women at the pitbrows, and to demand the franchise.
